schema.title: Vite Preview Server

proxyConfig.description: Path to the proxy configuration file.

host.description: Specify which IP addresses the server should listen on.

open.description: Automatically open the app in the browser on server start. When the value is a string, it will be used as the URL's pathname.

mode.description: Mode to run the server in.

clearScreen.description: Set to false to prevent Vite from clearing the terminal screen when logging certain messages.

staticFilePath.description: Path where the build artifacts are located. If not provided then it will be infered from the buildTarget executor options as outputPath
